summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 12 requirements (REQ-9 through REQ-20) with comprehensive changes to both frontend and backend. The cyberpunk theme is fully implemented with neon blue and electric purple accents throughout. The hero section text matches specifications exactly. A centered search bar is present in the navigation. Four new product categories are implemented in both backend and frontend. Video preview support with hover auto-play is implemented. Guest checkout flow removes authentication requirements. A Mega Bundle section is prominently displayed on the homepage. Frequently Bought Together functionality is implemented on product detail pages. Product detail pages show crossed-out pricing, trust badges, and sticky add-to-cart buttons. Download URLs are in the backend schema and order confirmation displays download links. A DMCA/Copyright page is accessible from the footer. Bullet-point descriptions are rendered on product detail pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for data structure transformation from old to new schema
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested a data migration system or backward compatibility with old product schemas. This appears to be infrastructure code not specified in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: 3D Scene component with React Three Fiber rendering geometric shapes, PBR materials, and HDR lighting
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-10 updates the hero section content, no requirement in REQ-9 through REQ-20 requests maintaining or implementing 3D scene functionality. The BuildRequest constraints mention not implementing features that were previously part of the application but are not in scope for this specific transformation.

hallucinated_features.description: Blob storage functionality with MixinStorage inclusion in backend
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions blob storage, file upload functionality, or storage mixins. REQ-18 specifies external cloud storage links (Google Drive, Mega.nz), not internal blob storage.
